title: Diamond Player looking for a good team
body:
Hi, im looking for a nice ranked 5s team. i main mid and top but i can fill. been playing since season 1 and play pretty much all champs (play a lot of aram).

i have 3 accounts 2 diam s4 and one gold s4.

add IGN koopa yoshi or hello im yoshi or im yoshi

replies.body: I also got an account with 4 ranked team gold 1 and 2 last season and unranked this season, im the leader in all of them so i can add a new roster since we havent played in a long while.
